snippet: Readers variously say the scrutiny of conservatives was too much and too little, and ask what if the shoe were on the other foot.
lead_paragraph: Readers variously say the scrutiny of conservatives was too much and too little, and ask what if the shoe were on the other foot.

headline.main: The I.R.S. Scandal: Criticism From All Sides
headline.print_headline: The I.R.S. Scandal: Criticism From All Sides
